trans-unit.source: Provides type converters for converting <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> objects to and from objects of other types.

This class also has methods for writing a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>.
See the base classes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> for important usage notes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ColorTypeConverter"></xref> class.
See the base classes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter> for important usage notes.
Returns a value that indicates whether this converter can convert an instance of a specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
As implemented in this class, this method returns `true` only if `sourceType` is a <xref:System.String>.
The `context` parameter is not used.
See **Notes for Inheritors**.
An object that provides contextual information.
The type of object that is a candidate for conversion.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if objects of the specified type can be converted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Returns a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.ColorTypeConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> to an instance of a specified type.
As implemented in this class, this method returns `true` only if `destinationType` is a <xref:System.String>.
The `context` parameter is not used.
See **Notes for Inheritors**.
An object that provides contextual information.
The type of object that you want to convert a color to.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if conversion is possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Converts a specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref>.
This method is not implemented in this class—except to throw exceptions.
See **Notes for Inheritors**.
An object that provides contextual information.
The language and culture that are used during the conversion.
The object that is converted.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> object.
This method is called from this class instead of from a derived class.
The value is .
The value is not a type that can be converted.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Color"></xref> to an object of the specified type.
As implemented in this class, `destinationType` must be a <xref:System.String> or the exception is thrown.
The format of the string varies according to the value of `context` and `culture`.
If `culture` is `null`, the current system culture is used.
An object that provides contextual information.
The language and culture that are used during the conversion.
The object you want to convert.
The type that `value` is converted to.
The new <xref:System.Object> of the designated type.
The destinationType is not a type that value can be converted to.
-or- The culture is a neutral culture.
Gets a collection of property descriptions for the specified type.
This method is not implemented in this class—except to throw the exception.
See **Notes for Inheritors**.
An object that provides contextual information.
An object of the type for which you need property descriptions.
An array of attributes that filter the returned collection to exclude irrelevant properties.

A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> that contains the property descriptions that are exposed for the component; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no property descriptions are returned.
This method is called from this class instead of from a derived class.

Serializes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and returns its [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] as a string.
An object that provides contextual information.
The object to be serialized.
A <xref:System.String> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the color context.
The colorContext is .
